item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Li-Pang Huang. I’m a Research Assistant at Institute of Information Science, Academia Sinica. I’m currently working on Data Visualization, Backend Distributed System, and AirBox Deployment in AirBox Project. You can check PM2.5 quality in Taiwan on IDW Map.
